meanings.definition: Resembling a disc in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The UFO had a disclike shape as it hovered in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The coin was disclike, round and shiny.
meanings.sent3: The disclike pizza looked so perfect, it seemed almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were disclike, wide and full of wonder.
meanings.sent5: The disclike moon shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or appearance of a disc.
meanings.sent1: The disclike object spun rapidly on the table.
meanings.sent2: The toy had a disclike design that made it easy to throw.
meanings.sent3: The disclike mirror reflected everything in the room with precision.
meanings.sent4: His disclike watch seemed to control time itself.
meanings.sent5: The disclike button gleamed in the sunlight.
